com.riskgame.service

Class ReadAndWriteMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.ReadAndWriteMap

  • public class ReadAndWriteMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims to load and existing map in the game and performs various validation to check if its a valid map.Post loading user can also edit a map. The values are saved in the form of an object and then passed to the called function to perform user asked operation.
    Author:
    Shresthi Garg

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap(GameMapGraph mapgraph,
                    java.lang.String oldFileName)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method aims to save the map which was edited post loading into the game. It also checks if the user wishes to rename the file and performs various validation with respect to it.
        Parameters:
        mapgraph - - GameMapGraph object containing the details of the loaded map.
        oldFileName - - The file name of the loaded map.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws input output

      • uploadMap

        public boolean uploadMap(java.lang.String fileName)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called when the user wishes to play game by uploading a map. It performs validation and then stores the details of the valid file in the form of GameMapGraph object.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - The file which was uploaded.
        Returns:
        flag - To determine if the returned content is valid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - -throws input output

      • validatecontinents

        public boolean validatecontinents(java.lang.String tagData)
        This method aims validate list of continents available in the uploaded file and checks if they are in correct format.
        Parameters:
        tagData - Value of the continent tag
        Returns:
        flag of type boolean determines if the entered continents are valid

      • validatecountries

        public boolean validatecountries(java.lang.String tagData)
        This method aims validate list of countries available in the uploaded file and checks if they are in correct format.
        Parameters:
        tagData - Value of the countries tag
        Returns:
        flag of type boolean determines if the entered countries are valid

      • validatemetadata

        public boolean validatemetadata(java.lang.String tagData)
        This method aims validate list of map tag data available in the uploaded file and checks if they are in correct format.
        Parameters:
        tagData - Value of the map tag data
        Returns:
        flag of type boolean determines if the entered map tags are valid

      • checkcountryadjancy

        public boolean checkcountryadjancy()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method aims to check adjacency between countries in the uploaded file and checks if they are in correct format.
        Returns:
        flag of type boolean determines if the entered countries are properly defined as adjacent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws input output
